data.system_settings: Dell Latitude E5540 - Windows 10 Professional x64 (Build 1703)
data.actual_result: Video goes full screen, and goes all pitch-black as if it disappeared.
data.expected_result: Video goes to full-screen and continues to show.
data.short_description: Video in Log Changes Disappears after Double-Clicking
data.steps_to_repro: -Go to your settings-Click on Change Logs-Click on play for the video-Double-click the video
